programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Evil
programme.desc: A detective must untangle past mistakes to figure out why he was targeted at the first place and becomes the murderer of a taxi driver.

programme.title: 71: Into The Fire
programme.desc: 71 student-soldiers fight an impossible war against the elite 766 Commando Brigade and turn the tide of the Korean War.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri has the ability to see ghosts. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: Confidential Assignment 2: International
programme.desc: N. Korea detective returns for another secret mission. Despite having different underlying motives, 3 countries join forces to bring down an international crime organization.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: Steel Rain: Summit
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.

programme.title: The Hot-Blooded
programme.desc: 4 friends gave up on Taekwondo and part ways after being asked to lose on purpose in a trial. Years later, they decided to take on a local gang realizing their hometown is threatened.

programme.title: Oh! My Gran
programme.desc: When his daughter suffer from a hit-and-run accident, her father tries to track down the driver with help from his mother who has Alzheimer's disease and the only witness to this accident.

programme.title: Very Ordinary Couple
programme.desc: A couple working in the same bank broke up but continue to see each other in workplace. They couldn't help but pay attention to each other even more than they were dating...

programme.title: 0.0Mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: Queen Of Walking
programme.desc: A high school girl who has to walk for four hours to school everyday unexpectedly discovers her talent for walking and begins training as a speed walking athlete.

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Evil
programme.desc: A detective must untangle past mistakes to figure out why he was targeted at the first place and becomes the murderer of a taxi driver.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: 12.12: The Day
programme.desc: Based on the 12.12 Military Insurrection. Chun Doo-Gwang staged a coup. Lee Tae-Shin is a commander who fights against Chun. The chaos led Seoul to an unexpected direction.

programme.title: Dr. Cheon And The Lost Talisman
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister...

programme.title: The King'S Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: The Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to take care of a case gone sideways.

programme.title: Don't Go Too Far
programme.desc: While arguing on the division of their father's 2B inheritance, the eldest brother received a call to realize his son was kidnapped, and the ransom demanded was 2B...

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.desc: Led by Meng Fei, an exploration team is embarking on a journey through the province of Jiangsu in China. The initiative aims to attract more tourists to Jiangsu and allow them to experience the "flavorful life."

programme.title: Talk With Famous Doctors Ep10
programme.desc: The program focuses new research and development of interactive health science popularization plan; from "treatment" to "prevention", increase the in-depth popularization of medical and health knowledge.

programme.title: Go Fighting! Season 9 (Repackaged) Ep12
programme.desc: Go Fighting! is a game-variety-reality show, Shermaine Wong, Wowkie Zhang, Gong Jun, Justin Huang, Yan Hoaxing, Johnny Huang, Jia Nailiang and Yun-peng Yue formed as challenging team to complete missions with an open-ended outdoor project at a landmark to win the objective.

programme.title: City All In Tribe Season 2 Ep1
programme.desc: A reality show to invite Justin Huang, Hankiz Omar, Li Hongyi, Victor Qin, Zhao Xiaotang with other guests to unlock the new style of the city with a new and upgraded story-style gameplay. They will play via games and challenges for audience to know more about the cities. What a good energetic and humorous way to discover the local charismas.

programme.title: No. 17 Live House Season 2 (Repackaged) Ep7
programme.desc: Five musicians, Liang Long, Hu Xia, Bai Jugang, Xilinnayi Gao, and Huang Zihongfan, have reversed their image as singers and became Live House staff, embarking on a new music journey with a brand-new attitude. At the same time, they launched a new slogan, "There is always endless happiness", inviting us to witness more beauty and surprises in life together.

programme.title: The Shape Of Culture Season 2 Ep11
programme.desc: The cultural show invited Shan Jixiang, Yun Zhou, Yan Xiao, Niu Junfeng as "youth troupe" to present new wonders, new landmarks, new sights and the diversity of world heritages and civilization from multiple perspectives and to undercover the story of the World Heritage sites behind.

programme.title: The Inheritors Season 3 Ep10
programme.desc: Intangible Cultural Heritage refers to the behavior or performance which is important for cultural inheritance in a certain district, such as folk custom, culture, beliefs, traditions, etc. As the theme of this program, the results of protection of intangible cultural heritage could be demonstrated and promoted comprehensively.

programme.title: Go! Grand Canal Ep9
programme.desc: The Grand Canal, a world heritage site, will be explored from various perspectives, including history, politics, culture, and economics, highlighting its spiritual values and contributions to Chinese nation's history and culture.

programme.title: Taste‧Jiangsu Ep9
programme.desc: From the angles of Jiangsu cuisines flavor and characteristics, the differences and regional characteristics of North-South food are described. The creativity and emotions of people are connected with the food culture of Jiangsu, to demonstrate the uniqueness of Jiangsu cuisine.

programme.title: Travel through Jiangsu Season 2 Ep41
programme.desc: Travel around the scenic spots and historic sites and the streets and alleys of the whole province of Jiangsu, look for historians, scholars, folk artisans, etc., explore a glimpse of what traditional Chinese culture and discover the unique charm of Jiangsu.

programme.title: Travel With The Royal Family Ep2
programme.desc: Reunited for the first time in thirteen years were Ada Choi, Tao Xin-ran, Xi Lan, Zhang Xiao-long, Lan Ying-ying, Chen Si-si, and Yang Jiu-lang. Beginning from Daguanyuan in Beijing, the filming location of the top-leading drama "Empresses in the Palace", they traveled to various ethnic cultural origins. Through in-depth exploration and study, they experienced the local customs and culture, carrying with them both nostalgic memories and new aspirations, completing their "Rejuvenation Journey" across China.

programme.title: Tenday Ep2
programme.desc: 39 well-known competitors from a variety of industries, including Nicky Wu, Michelle Chen, Neo Hou, Lin Gengxin, and Shen Yue, are invited to participate in an immersive survival reality TV series. The show involves living in a real metropolis for 10 straight days in a closed-off setting. They will encounter tasks that will put their cooperation, mental, physical, and psychological faculties to the test. The champion will be the ultimate victor.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep117
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3438
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2972
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1055
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep118
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4940
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1942

programme.title: Walker Fun Kaohsiung (M) Ep219220
programme.desc: Walker Fun Kaohsiung is a travel reality show that takes viewers on an exciting journey through the vibrant city of Kaohsiung. With 35 different routes, the show explores the citys hidden gems, local culture, and unique experiences. From bustling night markets to serene temples, Walker Fun Kaohsiung showcases the best of Kaohsiung.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep23
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Taichung Player (M) Ep5556
programme.desc: The vibrant Chin-Lan Chang hosts a captivating journey through Taichung's cultural and creative industries, unique attractions, community initiatives, local arts, and heartfelt human stories. This show offers a rich blend of fun and learning, ensuring every moment is both enjoyable and enlightening.

programme.title: Top Singers (T) Ep634
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep964
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: My Hero, My Daddy (M) Ep3940
programme.desc: A fathers love for his daughters landed Jinfa Huang in battles against other men right within his family, as he found himself in conflict with his sons-in-law. His 3 daughters each possessed a distinct personality but were similarly headstrong and in romantic relationships that caused their fathers brows to crease. Tianlan, his eldest, was in love with Minglu Xu, Jinfas superior who never missed an opportunity to make life difficult for him; Tianhong, his second daughter, was drifting apart from him because of her husband; meanwhile, his youngest girl was challenging the taboo of a campus romance. How would Jinfa emerge victor in this fight to protect the 3 loves of his life?

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1055
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1055

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep66
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep964965
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep736
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep511
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep6061
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his fathers serious illness.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yong Zhen moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but ends up having to use his kung fu skills to survive and take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.title: We are Family
programme.desc: Struggling as an extra, Chi Kwong joins a rent-a-family company run by Carlos and aspiring actress Catherine, and rent themselves out as make-believe relatives. As they surrogate different families, they unravel the complexities of family relationships, forging deeper connections along the way.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: An ordinary, cheerful and kind-hearted girl Bao, meets a troubled rich guy Edward by chance one summer. To ruin his fathers remarriage plans, Edward hires Bao and her friend to sabotage the wedding and that is how Bao and Edward meet and fall in love. All seems well for the sweet couple until their love quickly takes an unexpected turn

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu has been waiting for her first love for 10 years but he marries someone else in the end. As she loses faith in love, she meets a wedding planner and a handsome and rich man, who both help her get over her ex-boyfriend. As Chu Chu feels the same love from them, she must make up her mind. Who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigator William is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, William uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the governments $15 billion Care Fund. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the worlds best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the worlds top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Inspired by Hong Kongs biggest financial scandal in the 1980s, this is a rags to riches story about Ching Yat Yin who is chairman of a listed company. With Chings wealth and influence on the rise, ICAC senior investigator Lau Kai Yuen is determined to investigate the case, even if it means spending 15 years in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Silent Code
programme.desc: Reporter Lan is tasked to research news from the internet, and stumbles across a popular BBS forum, Dream Board. Xiang, the forum founder, creates space for netizens to share dreams and ideas, but ended up being the subject of a heated debate due to a leaked video. As Lan digs for the truth, she finds things are more complicated than it seems...

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: When Chen Zhen studies in Japan, he finds several Chinese students missing and accidentally uncovers the Black Dragon Societys conspiracy. A new drug is invented to boost bodies of the Japanese troops in war and the Chinese students are used in their experiments. Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who has the power to enter a persons subconscious mind. In her latest case, she suspects that another psychiatrist is responsible for a brutal murder-cum-suicide case involving a social worker. In the investigation process, Ching finds herself under suspicion instead, as she comes face-to-face with a past trauma

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jins pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wifes death.

programme.title: L Storm
programme.desc: ICAC officer Luk and Chief Inspector Lau both hit a dead end when investigating their respective bribery and money laundering cases. When Luk is accused of bribery after being framed by the money launderers, he risks everything he has to find crucial evidence against them to clear his name.

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Taos real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but he forgives Qi after knowing Qis guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fianc, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich mans party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chiefs granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chuns plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas pursuit.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hons pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: Disciples of the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The Emperor and his Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlongs younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Holy Flame of the Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a Generals daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Spirit of the Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Deadly Duo
programme.desc: The prince of the Sung Dynasty is captured by the Chin invaders and is guarded by top martial arts masters. It is up to two powerful patriots to fight the overwhelming odds and pull off the impossible: to rescue the royal Prince and get out of the Chin stronghold alive.

programme.desc: Leonard and Howard enlist Barry Kripke (JOHN ROSS BOWIE) to help after they learn Sheldon betrayed them by working with the military behind their backs.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 9
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to teach the guys a lesson after they cut him out of a potentially valuable Bitcoin investment; a seven-year-old video reveals a secret about Leonard and Penny's relationship.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 10
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy try to eliminate stress from wedding planning by applying math to the process. Also, Raj breaks up with Howard after realizing his best friend is actually hurting his confidence.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 11
programme.desc: Sheldon plans an authentic Little House on the Prairie dinner for Amy's birthday, while Leonard laments his own lack of accomplishments at Christmastime.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 12
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy subject their friends to a series of secret experiments to discover who would be the most qualified to be Best Man and Maid of Honor at their wedding.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 04
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke host the ultimate Battle of the Bags by discovering the best hacks for carrying groceries. Plus, they welcome rubber gloves to the All Star Club and explore hacks from the original Hack Master: Benjamin Franklin.

programme.title: Friends S4 18
programme.desc: Ross and his ex-wife become jealous when their lovers go to England together. Rachel's plans to seduce her boyfriend go awry.

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 6
programme.desc: Exploding balls, a barrage of buckshot and more plague those competing for a shot at the prize.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 05
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke search for the ultimate lipstick hack, explore beeswax as a waterproofing technique, and welcome an old tire into the All-Star Club. Plus, this week's "Hack Master" will go to the extreme by hacking Kevin's brain.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 06
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke put the best shaving hacks to the test in the ultimate beard-off, and find out if using a drill to eat corn is hack or wack. Plus, they'll welcome toothpaste into the All-Star Club and use pencil lead to make a light bulb.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 07
programme.desc: Explore hacks for all ages, from staying clean while eating ribs, to staying young in your golden years. Plus, watch hacks for making soap and hanging shelves, and get ready to welcome the twist tie to the All Star Club.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 08
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin discover the best hacks for stretching out shoes and removing coffee stains. Plus, they'll welcome hangers into the All Star Club, explore the most delicious hack from history, and meet the newest Hack Hero.

programme.title: Friends S4 16
programme.desc: Trying to become better acquainted with her sexy client, Rachel inadvertently thwarts Ross' plans for a romantic evening with his girlfriend.

programme.title: Friends S4 17
programme.desc: The guys realize their TV is picking up a porno station for free, and Phoebe discovers she's carrying triplets.

programme.title: Friends S4 19
programme.desc: Drastic changes occur in Ross' relationship with Emily. Monica and Rachel will do anything to get their old apartment back from the guys.

programme.title: The Mule
programme.desc: Earl, a man in his 80s, is broke, alone, and facing foreclosure of his business when he is offered a job that simply requires him to drive. Easy enough, but, unbeknownst to Earl, he's just signed on as a drug courier for a Mexican cartel...

programme.title: Rock Of Ages
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Broadway musical about two people who fall in love whilst pursuing their Hollywood dreams.

programme.title: Caught! S2 S2 4
programme.desc: Whether a crook on trial takes flight or an inmate gets cozy with a corrections officer, handcuffs and prison walls are no match for rebellious convicts who make last-ditch efforts to break free.

programme.title: Friends S4 20
programme.desc: Monica wears Emily's wedding dress. Chandler forces Joey to get treatment for his snoring at a sleep clinic. Rachel scares Joshua away by impulsively proposing marriage.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S3 13
programme.desc: At a local copy shop, Michael introduces a print-by-hand technique, and at a bait and tackle shop, he unveils the latest fish fashion trends. Finally, at an office, Michael pulls a switcheroo, and the new temp has no idea who's the boss.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 14
programme.desc: Michael unveils the ancient mystery behind bowling balls, and later does the world's longest spit-take! Plus, LITERALLY THE BIGGEST special guest in the show's history, a.k.a. Shaquille O'Neal, helps with a plan to blow one superfan's mind!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 15
programme.desc: While posing as a cook, Michael warms up his vocal chords to serenade a clam out of its shell, and later, he shocks his sous chef with a fish stick stowaway. Plus, a spirited trick leaves one man questioning the afterlife.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 16
programme.desc: When Michael opens a shocking package at a shipment warehouse, a man goes hog wild. And while pigs may not fly, Michael proves that kittens can. Plus, one woman believes that a curse has transformed a man right before her eyes.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 17
programme.desc: While working in an art supply store, Michael astounds a customer with a framing device, shocks a patron who can't see the whole picture and becomes a piece of art. Later, a woman goes haywire when Michael literally loses his head.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 4
programme.desc: Our buyers throw down to score a locker packed with rare movie memorabilia. Then, Papa Bear and T-Money each scoop up low-grade bins, but when they each start to sift through their individual messes, one of them finds a childhood dream-come-true. Andlater, the day's final auction sparks an intense bidding war, but when one of our buyers shoots the moon on his bid, it leaves everyone else wondering exactly where all of this cash is coming from.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 5
programme.desc: Our buyers lock horns to win a unit packed with valuable construction equipment. Then, Brandon and Lori spot something that no one else does, but they'll have to play it cool if they want to walk away with this golden score. And later, the day's final locker smells of gas and cash, but leads to a showdown that gets one of our buyers banned from the auction.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 6
programme.desc: Minds are blown when two of our buyers team up for a major score. It's an unlikely pair that, together, could make a pile of cash. Plus, Jesse takes a big gamble on some African art and sweats it out hard when the authenticity is questioned. And later, the day's final auction reveals contents so shocking our buyers may be shut out of this game completely.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 7
programme.desc: Brandon and Jesse lock horns in a do or die bidding war. One of them spies an authentic treasure hidden amongst the contents, but only one will walk away with the score. And later, a newbie steals a prize unit out from under our regulars and proves that she's here to play. Then, Brandon and Lori unearth a five-alarm find. If it works, they could be looking at a $20,000 pay day on this item alone.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 18
programme.desc: While posing as a security guard, Michael turns a metal detector into a microwave, exposes a surveillance operation, and finds himself in the line of fire. And later, a mover is dumbfounded when a woman rises from the ashes.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 19
programme.desc: Michael refreshes stale nachos, peels back the truth behind a fake bill and unveils the latest in cellular soda machine technology. But what will happen when he breathes new life into a T-Rex?

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 20
programme.desc: Michael serves up a drink that can eat away at anything, and a cleanse so organic it creates life.Then, his sneaker lacing technology shocks a customer and he tricks an assistant into thinking someone has risen from the dead.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 21
programme.desc: Michael pushes a soup machine fit for space travel. Then he reveals a shocking DIY ear wax removal kit and gives a magical massage. Finally, a trick throws a mover into a time warp when he sees the future and repeats the past.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 22
programme.desc: Working as a florist, Michael nukes flowers, sheds light on frog mutation, and turns an ant farm into a work of art. Later, he shocks a passerby in the park with his cat-dog, and then stuns someone else with a delivery from up above.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 6
programme.desc: Clark finds himself in uncharted territory, and Lois bonds with a new friend. Meanwhile, Superman pays Bruno Mannheim a surprise visit.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 7
programme.desc: Lois and Clark dig deeper on Bruno Mannheim, starting with his connections to Hobs Bay Medical Center, while Jonathan and Jordan panic at home over Lois dire diagnosis.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 8
programme.desc: In the wake of learning that Bruno and Peia are married, Clark works to reignite Lois interest in taking Bruno down.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 9
programme.desc: Superman and John Henry clash over how to handle Bruno Mannheim, while Lois worries over upcoming treatments and confides in Lana about her early courtship with Clark.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 10
programme.desc: Lois attempts to interview Peia in the hopes of unearthing the truth about an old case, while Clark struggles to spend quality time with the boys.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: What if, in the wake of more than a decade of devastating weather events, we finally found a way to control Mother Nature and the destruction her tirades entail? When catastrophic climate change endangers Earths very survival, world governments unite and create Project Dutch Boy: a global net of satellites surrounding the planet that are armed with geo-engineering technologies designed to stave off the natural disasters. Two estranged brothers (Gerard Butler, Jim Sturgess) are tasked with solving the programs malfunction before a worldwide geostorm can engulf the planet.

programme.title: Strike The Blood Final Ep1
programme.desc: Returning With Glory I - Suspected to launch a large-scale terror attack, MAR is under siege from the fleet of Holy Ground Treaty Organization.

programme.title: Strike The Blood Final Ep2
programme.desc: Returning With Glory II - Fearing a large-scale attack by Netherworld of the Deva, the Japanese government is willing to negotiate with MAR.

programme.title: Strike The Blood Final Ep3
programme.desc: Returning With Glory III - The villagers come to a new place where they can reunite with Avrora. Mogwai asks them to protect a sealing system.

programme.title: Strike The Blood Final Ep4
programme.desc: Returning With Glory IV - MAR has lost its trump card, so they play hard and summon loads of huge demons to start invading Itogami Island.

programme.title: Legend Of The Galactic Heroes: Die Neue These - Intrigue Ep5
programme.desc: The Die Is Cast - Reinhard gathers generals and orders them to get the fleets ready to attack as the young Emperor is being kidnapped.

programme.title: Legend Of The Galactic Heroes: Die Neue These - Intrigue Ep6
programme.desc: The Legitimate Galactic Empire Government - In Heinessen, Trunicht holds a speech and announces Reinhard is a dictator and Remscheid is the legitimate prime minister.

programme.title: Kuroko's Basketball 2nd Season Ep22
programme.desc: It's Obvious - Seirin keeps catching up with Yosen. In the third quarter, Kagami and Himuro fight against each other.

programme.title: Kuroko's Basketball 2nd Season Ep23
programme.desc: I Don't Want To Lose - Murasakibara finally enters the court, who is unstoppable! Seirin adapts a new formation to tackle this giant.

programme.title: Kuroko's Basketball 2nd Season Ep24

programme.desc: Kunoichi Rumble: The Rivals Get Serious! - The fourth match between Sakura and Ino is taken very seriously by the both of them.

programme.title: Naruto I Ep43

programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S11 Ep127
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome Self Taught Bakers - Bakers try to guess what type of dessert is made in the kitchen by looking at the leftover crumbs, flour trails, and other clues. Later, the bakers recreate the menu.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Meet the Classically-Trained Competition - Six classically-trained baking duos search their kitchens for clues, which leads to several victories and one elimination.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Self-Taught: Not So Simple - The self-taught bakers investigate a twist on an all-time favourite sweet treat during the safety bake round. In the elimination round, the remaining bakers must figure out the correct dessert to make in order to avoid elimination.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Classically-Trained: Going Plum Crazy - Five classically-trained baking teams return to the kitchen to solve two more culinary crimes, including an elimination bake with a seasonal dessert of Yolanda's choosing; the team with the poorest performance is sent home after the elimination bake.

programme.title: Needle In A Timestack
programme.desc: A devoted husband will stop at nothing to save his marriage, after it gets destroyed by a time traveling rival. Based on a short story written by Robert Silverberg.

programme.title: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
programme.desc: Molly Mahoney is the awkward and insecure manager of Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium, the strangest, most fantastic, most wonderful toy store in the world. But when Mr. Magorium, the 243 year-old eccentric, who owns the store, bequeaths the store to her, a dark and ominous change begins to take over the once-remarkable Emporium.

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Nim is adventure author Alex Rovers number one fan and she lives on an isolated island with her scientist father. When her father is lost at sea and the island is being invaded, she convinces the agoraphobic and a germaphobe author to come and help.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: Clive Owen and Naomi Watts star in an adrenaline-pumping, action-packed thrill ride about a man determined to deliver justice to a corrupt international arms-dealing ringthat funds worldwide genocide and terrorism...no matter the cost!

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crash landing leaves teenager Kitai Raige (Jaden Smith) and his legendary father Cypher (Will Smith) stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after cataclysmic events forced humanitys escape.

programme.title: Takers
programme.desc: Matt Dillon, Idris Elba, Paul Walker and Hayden Christiansen star in this action-packed thriller full of twists and turns.

programme.title: Come Out Fighting
programme.desc: During WWII, the American army have raced their way through the countryside on the border of France entering Nazi Germany Hitler has deployed his secret weapon Lieutenant Frank Ross encounters the Nazi weapon and an intense aerial battle ensues

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat.

programme.title: Hard Target 2
programme.desc: Disgraced and retired mixed martial artist Wes The Jailor Baylor (Scott Adkins) couldn't refuse the million-dollar purse offered to fight in Myanmar.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A.
programme.desc: Snake Plissken, futuristic outlaw of ESCAPE FROM NEW YORK fame, enters the island of Los Angeles (after THE earthquake) to retrieve a top-secret weapons device that, in the wrong hands, could destroy the world.

programme.title: Desperado
programme.desc: A handsome musician-turned-gunslinger returns to a small Mexican town seeking revenge against an evil drug kingpin.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: After five criminals are released from a random police lineup, they plan a major heist that goes horribly awry. The police search for a mysterious crime lord, "Keyser Soze," who seems to be tied to the heist.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Al Pacino and Johnny Depp head an all-star cast in this brilliant gangland thriller about an undercover FBI agent who befriends a hitman to gain entry to the mob.

programme.title: Takers
programme.desc: Matt Dillon, Idris Elba, Paul Walker and Hayden Christiansen star in this action-packed thriller full of twists and turns.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crash landing leaves teenager Kitai Raige (Jaden Smith) and his legendary father Cypher (Will Smith) stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after cataclysmic events forced humanitys escape.

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Hunted by a ruthless agent and an army of corrupt cops working for a deadly drug kingpin, Toretto and OConner reunite the gang to pull off one last job - an insane heist worth $100 million!

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Enter a universe where more than one wears the mask.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz star in this nonstop action epic about the discovery of a long-lost treasure in the Egyptian desert that also unearths a 3,000-year-old legacy of terror!

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser and an all-star cast reunite in this action-packed adventure where an accursed mummy is resurrected -- along with a force even more powerful: The Scorpion King (The Rock).

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb Of The Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The OConnells must combat their deadliest enemy yet: a resurrected Emperor and his legion of 10,000 warriors, woken from a 2,000 year-old curse and hungry for brutal world domination.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: When a Russian Military Convoy is taken down in Moscow, Agent Hobbs goes to the only man who can help him find his target Dominic Toretto.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: The Mark of Empire S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ayutthaya - Curator and scholar Peter Lee charts Ayutthaya's transformation from a backwater state to a global superpower.

programme.title: Anton and Giovanni's Adventures in Sicily S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The first leg of Anton and Giovanni's Sicilian road trip begins in the port town of Sciacca. From there, it takes in Greek architecture, octopus fishing and a tango festival.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum Ep4
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelopes tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - The Young Ones Ep3
programme.desc: In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Jungle River Ep3
programme.desc: Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Tidelands Ep4
programme.desc: Head to Americas far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Baby Animals - Prequel 1 - Raising Babies Ep7
programme.desc: Follow the staff at Parc Omega in Quebec, Canada, during the busy spring when moose, boars, raccoons, and visiting Canada geese have their babies.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Ravi the Baby Lion Tailed Macaque Ep5
programme.desc: In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - Mvula's Journey Ep4
programme.desc: Mvula is the youngest calf in the Madzi family. Temperatures are soaring. Lagoons and waterholes are drying up. This forces Mvula and his family to undertake a long and dangerous journey to the only remaining source of water: the Luangwa River.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - Trouble in Paradise Ep3
programme.desc: Relaxing among the ancient temples of Sri Lanka, tufted grey langurs share their territory with a troop of toque macaques and a group of purple face leaf monkeys. This is primate paradise. But a crippling drought changes everything. The three species are forced to adapt and take risks.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum Ep4
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelopes tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.desc: In India, Ravi the baby lion-tailed macaque faces life in a shrinking habitat and encroaching human world. Luckily he has a caring mum, a protective dad, a playful sister, and numerous, cousins, aunts and uncles all watching over him.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - India Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome to India a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare. Monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum Ep4
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelopes tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - The Young Ones Ep3
programme.desc: In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Jungle River Ep3
programme.desc: Cheer as young gladiators earn their stripes in the dense tropical forests of the Americas. Stand back as a poison dart frog launches a toxic barrage, observe a jaguar-caiman turf war, and see a hungry coati cross paths with a defensive tarantula.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Tidelands Ep4
programme.desc: Head to Americas far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Isle Royale Ep1
programme.desc: Since the 1900s, this uninhabited island in Lake Superior has been a constant battleground between moose and wolves. Scientists have been watching closely since 1953, making it one of the oldest research projects in the country. We go with lead researcher Rolf Peterson as he gets a band of volunteers to scour the island for moose bones, trying to piece together population numbers after a long winter.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - The Coast Ep5
programme.desc: Massive elephant seals go nose to nose to win the title of beachmaster, and giant petrels earn the nickname, murderous garbagemen. Meanwhile, a female humpback goes to extremes to protect her calf from amorous males.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - The Little Penguin Ep1
programme.desc: Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighborhoods in nature. Theirs is a family saga of faithful relationships, committed homemaking, and vigorous nightlife.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Emu Ep2
programme.desc: The Emu is Australias biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich: two meters tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless. This bird inhabits a topsy turvy world, where females call the shots, eggs are green and men do all the work to produce and raise tiny babies, known as Stripeys.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - Aerial Hunters Ep3
programme.desc: Australias birds of prey are some of the region's fiercest predators. These highly specialised killers are powerful, resourceful and striking; they use some impressive weapons to survive. This is the story of Australias aerial hunters.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 - The Feathering Nest Ep4
programme.desc: Successful breeding is critical to the survival of any bird species, and in this episode we meet four species of birds which go to exceptional lengths to find mates and raise their young, giving the next generation the best chance of life. Wherever they live, these birds have got their work cut out, holding their territory against invaders, attracting and winning partners and safeguarding their chicks.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Back to School Ep1
programme.desc: Start a promising new term at the Orangutan Jungle School in Borneo. See newbie Bumi struggle to focus, track skittish Rumbas first timid steps toward independence, and cheer on star student Valentino as he experiences a bumpy start to college.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Class Reunion Ep2
programme.desc: Follow new graduate Beni, who gets an exciting introduction to jungle college alongside former classmates Sura, Meryl, and Wine. Check on new arrival Molly and join Dr. Nadine as she grades slowpoke Bumi and wild child Monita on their latest lessons.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Hard Lessons Ep3
programme.desc: Shudder as food-obsessed Beni gets a dramatic, educational smackdown from the local dominant male, Petruk. See spoiled rich kid Spanser, a former illegal pet, try to tamp down his sweet tooth before roguish Bumi goes on a wild joyride with Greta.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - A Pangolin's Plight Ep5
programme.desc: Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amandas team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the centers baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Crocodile Capers Ep6
programme.desc: Strap in for Dr. Amandas risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, whos headed back to the wild.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.
