programme.desc: Australias birds of prey are some of the region's fiercest predators. These highly specialised killers are powerful, resourceful and striking; they use some impressive weapons to survive. This is the story of Australias aerial hunters.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - The Coast Ep5
programme.desc: Massive elephant seals go nose to nose to win the title of beachmaster, and giant petrels earn the nickname, murderous garbagemen. Meanwhile, a female humpback goes to extremes to protect her calf from amorous males.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Back to School Ep1
programme.desc: Start a promising new term at the Orangutan Jungle School in Borneo. See newbie Bumi struggle to focus, track skittish Rumbas first timid steps toward independence, and cheer on star student Valentino as he experiences a bumpy start to college.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Class Reunion Ep2
programme.desc: Follow new graduate Beni, who gets an exciting introduction to jungle college alongside former classmates Sura, Meryl, and Wine. Check on new arrival Molly and join Dr. Nadine as she grades slowpoke Bumi and wild child Monita on their latest lessons.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 3 - Hard Lessons Ep3
programme.desc: Shudder as food-obsessed Beni gets a dramatic, educational smackdown from the local dominant male, Petruk. See spoiled rich kid Spanser, a former illegal pet, try to tamp down his sweet tooth before roguish Bumi goes on a wild joyride with Greta.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - A Pangolin's Plight Ep5
programme.desc: Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amandas team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the centers baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Crocodile Capers Ep6
programme.desc: Strap in for Dr. Amandas risky attempt to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, chase down blue monkey Indigo while unrest ensues among the vervets. Examine an eagle owl with bumblefoot and say adieu to Sheila the croc, whos headed back to the wild.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Invaders from the Deep Ep2
programme.desc: As far as invasive species go, Asian carp are some of the nastiest invaders around. They've thus far made their way up America's waterways, snaking up the Illinois river, eating voraciously, breeding quickly, and decimating native fish populations and their food supplies.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Bonaire National Marine Park Ep1
programme.desc: Deep in the South Caribbean Sea, explore the protected waters of Bonaire National Marine Park, home to thriving reefs, endangered sea turtles, sprawling mangroves, and a plethora of marine life.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary Ep2
programme.desc: This episode examines the importance of three marine habitat types in the Florida Keys including the animals within them and conservationists efforts to protect them.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Monterey Bay Marine Sanctuary Ep3
programme.desc: On the West Coast of the United States, the Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary is the largest marine sanctuary in the country - home to 525 species of fish, and a massive, underwater Kelp forest.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - The Mesoamerican Reef Ep4
programme.desc: The Mesoamerican Reef is a pristine ocean ecosystem- but after decades of overfishing and tourist activity, much of this reef is in jeopardy. These Parks are monitored by Ocean advocates dedicated to maintaining the shark feeding grounds, turtle populations and marine spawning grounds that line this incredible reef system.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Bahamas Exuma Cays Ep5
programme.desc: The Exuma Cays are a remote wonder: hundreds of tiny islands extending south from the Bahamian Capital of Nassau. In the 1950s, developers dreamed of developing this pristine, and largely unexplored region. But before construction could begin, the Bahamian government supported an expedition to chart the cays. They liked what they saw, and in 1959 established the Bahamas National Trust, creating the Bahamas first Ocean Park.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australias most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Winter Ep4
programme.desc: Winter is the ultimate challenge for wildlife across America. Will they escape to milder southern climates or stay put and tough out the season? See how different creatures respond to the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - The Outcasts Ep1
programme.desc: In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here the resident leopard who, unlike the other predators, is powerful and agile enough to climb trees. Hes not an easy foe to elude.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - Living on the Edge Ep2
programme.desc: The plains and woodlands of the Luangwa Valley are the wildest and most merciless of all neighborhoods where duels between predator and prey are played out both day and night. For the animals that call this home, its a daily battle to stay alive.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - The Acacia Loop Ep3
programme.desc: As the dry season begins, thousands of animals are making their way to the Acacia Loop. Each must establish their place in the pecking order and avoid the dangerous residents who are all too willing to make a meal of the unwary.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed 1 - Mvula's Journey Ep4
programme.desc: Mvula is the youngest calf in the Madzi family. Temperatures are soaring. Lagoons and waterholes are drying up. This forces Mvula and his family to undertake a long and dangerous journey to the only remaining source of water: the Luangwa River.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Tropical Ep1
programme.desc: Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Seasonal Ep2
programme.desc: Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Water Worlds Ep3
programme.desc: Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Mountains Ep4
programme.desc: Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock. Tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy, and watch an aromatic tree bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Boreal Ep5
programme.desc: Travel to the Arctic for a peek at the brutal challenges of life in the boreal forest, then admire some stellar animal adaptations. Witness a secret reindeer superpower, navigate a rodent labyrinth of snow, and learn why moose are gourmets at heart.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Extreme Ep6
programme.desc: Learn how plants and animals tough it out in some of the driest terrain Earth has to offer. Run across thirsty trees that act as elephant signposts, see insects team up with plants for a chance at life, and get insight into natural chemical warfare.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Tropical Ep1
programme.desc: Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep2
programme.desc: The Sleepover Save / The Very Hungry Vacuum - Marcus is having his first sleepover and Phoebe is concerned that Marcus may be nervous so Phoebe sets out to make sure he has the best first sleepover ever. / When Athenas magical jump rope gets sucked up by the familys new robot vacuum, she loses confidence in her abilities, only to learn that her real abilities are already inside her.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep19
programme.desc: Treasure Riders - When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep43
programme.desc: That Sinking Feeling - When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep44
programme.desc: The Jungle Rooster - When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep17
programme.desc: Lucky And The Field Trip Fraud - Lucky is determined to shed her reputation as teachers pet on the class field trip.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep18
programme.desc: Lucky And The Shaky Day - When an earthquake takes out the railroad bridge, the PALs must find a way to stop the oncoming train which Jim is aboard

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep15
programme.desc: Best Friends Day / The White Whale - Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesnt love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep7
programme.desc: Mailed Away / The Wandering Wand - When Harper unknowingly drops her cooking camp application on the way to post office, its up to the Dew Drops to get it into that big blue mailbox. / When Cassie accidentally places Lola's beloved, old toy wand in a box marked for a giveaway drive in the park, the Dew Drops must find a way to retrieve the wand before it ends up in the hands of an entirely new family.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep20
programme.desc: Freepy Friday - Grug and Eep get into an argument and end up switching places to prove how hard it is to the other to be them. We follow Eep as the parent and Grug as the teenager at school and at home

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep21
programme.desc: Grug V Gurg / Unfair Fair - Grug wants a day off from his honey-do-list so he subs in doppelganger Gurg/Eep and Thunk set out to sabotage Bulk and Sulk's "idea fair" project because they always win even though Snoot comes up with the ideas.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep5
programme.desc: Monster Machine - The annual baby pageant approaches, but Stacis plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep6
programme.desc: The Constipation Situation - Boss Baby struggles to take a sick day even though a mysterious baby cry is wreaking havoc on the neighborhood baby-love

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep33
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush - The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/BFFF - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesnt believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep52
programme.desc: Switcher-Ruby/Bye Bye Bunker - Poppy and Branch switch bodies, and learn to appreciate each others point of view. /When Branch decides its time for him to move out of the bunker, Poppy tries to be as supportive as she can, even though it seems Branch himself may have some doubts.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep1
programme.desc: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud - Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep35
programme.desc: Fast Food Lemur Nation - Tired of waiting so long for his meals, King Julien introduces fast food to the kingdom, but the side effects are not what he expected.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep9
programme.desc: Return To The Balmera - The Paladins attempt to liberate the inhabitants of the Balmera, but the arrival of a Galra battle cruiser puts the mission at risk.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep35
programme.desc: Zero Dunk Thunky / Pie Vs Pie - Thunk is captured by the Broods and develops feelings for Blurg /At the Valley's food competition, Thunk and Ugga mistakenly make a new hit food

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep9
programme.desc: Lucky And The Super Amazing And Fun Cousin Julian - Luckys buttons are pushed when her seemingly perfect cousin Julian comes to visit but reveals himself to be a junior con man

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep9
programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep21
programme.desc: It's On Like Amazon! - Wally and Wenda go on a mission to return the borrowed Quick Bloom Key to its owner, an Amazon-dwelling wizard named Vinebeard. But Odlulu intercepts the key so she can use its magic for her lemonade stand. Using local trails, Wally and Wenda must track Odlulu through the jungle. They'll have to raft the Amazon and brave Odlulu's ""living"" plants to complete their mission

programme.title: Olivia Ep21
programme.desc: Olivia And The Babies - After noticing all the great compliments Mother receives on account of adorable baby William, Olivia finds herself some babies of her own: her cat Edwin and her dog Perry. Being a mum is tougher than it seems, but when Mother asks Olivia to watch William for a minute, her new skills come in handy.

programme.title: Olivia Ep22
programme.desc: Olivia's Pirate Treasure - When Olivia and her family go to the beach, Olivia finds what she thinks is a pearl-making oyster. She enlists Ian and Julian to help her find more, imagining that they're pirates in search of buried treasure. In reality, Father explains that they've actually found clams: no pearls inside, but great for a clambake!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep17
programme.desc: Simply The Best - Molecom is very grateful to Plugger for rescuing him after yet another of Flash's pranks. But Plugger is soon frustrated by Molecom's attempts to help Meanwhile, Roary is trying hard to beat his best lap time.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep18
programme.desc: Cici Wins The Day - Cici is fed up with never winning and decides not to take part in the race that day. Can Roary persuade her to change her mind?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep17
programme.desc: Why Crocodile Has A Bumpy Back - You see there was a time when Crocodile didn't have a bumpy back. His skin was all smooth and he had to be very careful of the hot Tinga Tinga sun. One day whilst napping Crocodile gets very sunburnt and falls into a deep sleep. Lion warns all the animals to be on their guard as the Wildebeest have returned to Tinga Tinga and they could stampede at any moment. Crocodile misses the meeting, snoring under the hot sun. The animals try to warn snappy Crocodile but it's too late and the Wildebeest stampede! OOOoof! . All over Crocodile. From that day on Crocodile has a bumpy back and is grumpier and snappier than ever! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep18
programme.desc: Why Jackal Howls At The Moon - You see there was a time when Jackal didn't howl at the moon. He was a trickster and he always wanted what was not rightfully his. Jackal took over Hen's nest and Aardvark's burrow. He even took the cub's supper from Mama Cheetah! Enough was enough! All the animals decide to teach Jackal a lesson and make him believe that the Moon is made of the sweetest, most delicious honey in Tinga Tinga. Of course, Jackal instantly wants some but it never comes. From that day on Jackal howls up at the moon, waiting for another drop of delicious MOOoooon honey! Tales from Africa.

programme.desc: Chef J's Tale - Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep34
programme.desc: The Butterfly War - King Julien declares a war against butterflies to raise his kingdom's spirit, but when the village is destroyed he decides to hold a peace summit.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep34
programme.desc: Puppy Party! - Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a No-Paperworkist movement to avoid Buddy From HRs constant paperwork.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep35
programme.desc: Mega Fat - After Mega Fat is fired from Baby Corp;hes forced on the path of recovery towards being a Good Baby. However;Mega Fat is more interested in getting revenge on Boss Baby than finding the perfect family to adopt him.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep33
programme.desc: To Heather Or Not To Heather - When Heather and Windshear land on Dragon's Edge to join the Dragon Rider crew, they quickly discover that Windshear doesn't play well with others.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep34
programme.desc: Stryke Out - Hiccup and Toothless are captured and must find a way to escape the Dragon Fighting arena and survive an attack from the fearsome Triple Stryke dragon.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep33
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush - The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep11
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 2 - Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blades life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep12
programme.desc: The Liar and The Thief - The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhminis hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years shes been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep33
programme.desc: Copy Cat - When Puss accidentally agrees to ride for both Artephius and the orphans in the annual San Lorenzo horse race, his twin Puss Dos enters the race.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep34
programme.desc: Coin Toss - Dulcinea must save the town from thieves when Puss and the townspeople become obsessed with a gambling game and forget to protect San Lorenzo.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep33
programme.desc: Blank Day / Haircuffed - When Poppy finds out theres a day on the Troll calendar with no existing holiday, as Queen she must help choose a new one./In an attempt to get Creek and Branch to stop arguing, Poppy braids their hair together, forcing them to learn to get along.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep34
programme.desc: Marshtato Fairy / Do the Biggie - On the foggiest night of the year, the Marshtato Fairy magically delivers marshtatos to Troll Village, which every Troll loves and celebrates- except for Branch, who doesnt think the Marshtato Fairy exists. When Poppy encourages him to believe, Branch set out to prove Poppy wrong. /When Biggie accidentally invents a dance craze, he realizes how much he enjoys being the center of attention. Biggie and Guy set out to create another Troll dance sensation in order to keep Biggies big moment going.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep45
programme.desc: The Good Book - Julien hires Croc Ambassador, an etiquette expert, to teach the kingdom how to behave at a classy ball, but everyone is too uptight to party

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep46
programme.desc: The King And Mrs. Mort - When King Julien gets sick, Mort must attend the Best Kingdom of Madagascar Award ceremony and comes back to find a Queen has taken his place

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep19
programme.desc: Lucky And The Golden Opportunity - When the PALs find gold, things spiral out of control until Lucky and Spirit have to rescue their friends from the bottom of a mine!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep20
programme.desc: Lucky And The Lion - When a mountain lion is spotted in Miradero, no one is safe!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep14
programme.desc: Chef J's Tale - Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky Penny / Hammys Day Out - Marcus has a piano recital and unknowingly forgets his lucky penny at home. Now its up to the Dew Drops to get the penny across town and back into Marcus pocket before showtime. / When Nicholas rolls the hamster ball (with Hammy inside) out into the streets, the Dew Drops must get Hammy back home safely.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep22
programme.desc: Baby Face Off / The Pursuit Of Wrinkliness - Thunk babysits Sandy and new baby Cliff to prove his responsible. Cliff is a jerk and keeps getting Sandy in trouble/Gran worries that Thunk isn't tough enough to survive to adulthood because he likes to hang out with old people, so she puts him through a series of toughness tests.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep23
programme.desc: Croodtopia / Hand On A Hard Egg - When the adults come down with the sneezles, the kids (including Lerk and Womp) use the chance to create their own society ("you-topia") with no rules, but Eep and Thunk disagree on how to run it/Food is scarce and when a large egg is spotted on the hunting field, Grug, Eep, Snoot, Munk and Squawk call dibbs. It's decided that whoever is tough enough to be the last holding on, wins the food.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep7
programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. Our villains alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep2
programme.desc: Two Party System / Fun Branch - Poppy discovers that Branch and Bridgets birthdays are on the same day and throws them both partiesBranch attempts to prove to the Snack Pack that he is fun.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep3
programme.desc: Royal Review / Funishment - Poppy faces her first royal review as Queen and sets out to ensure 100 happiness in Troll VillagePoppy must figure out how to handle crime in Troll Village when Cooper steals a pie.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Secrets Of The Scroll Ep1
programme.desc: Kung Fu Panda: Secrets Of The Scroll - Tigress, Viper, Monkey, Crane and Mantis transform from complete strangers into the legendary Furious Five Warriors of Kung Fu.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Secrets of the Furious Five Ep1
programme.desc: Kung Fu Panda: Secrets Of The Furious Five - Po and the Furious Five face Shifu's biggest challenge yet as they discover it takes a lot more than fast feet and fists to become a kung fu master.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Secrets of the Masters Ep1
programme.desc: Kung Fu Panda: Secrets Of The Masters - Po and the Furious Five go back in time to uncover the origin storiesof Gongman City's greatest heroes: Master Thundering Rhino, Master Storming Ox and Master Croc.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda Holiday Special Ep1
programme.desc: Kung Fu Panda Holiday - Po prepares for his favorite holiday, the Winter Feast and learns the true meaning of tradition, community and family.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep7
programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. Our villains alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep2
programme.desc: Two Party System / Fun Branch - Poppy discovers that Branch and Bridgets birthdays are on the same day and throws them both partiesBranch attempts to prove to the Snack Pack that he is fun.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep3
programme.desc: Royal Review / Funishment - Poppy faces her first royal review as Queen and sets out to ensure 100 happiness in Troll VillagePoppy must figure out how to handle crime in Troll Village when Cooper steals a pie.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep36
programme.desc: Get Off My Lawn - When King Julien thinks he's a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep10
programme.desc: Rebirth - When a Galra monster descends upon the Balmera, Team Voltron must find a way to save the deteriorating living planet and its alien inhabitants

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep36
programme.desc: Super Smash Siblings / A Hole In Grug - Eep and Thunk compete against their classmates in Ahhh-Smashin/After being denied a spot on the Valley's Wall of Fame, Grug creates a new game

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep10
programme.desc: Lucky And The Harvest Hunt - Lucky takes part in a secret Miradero tradition a nighttime scavenger hunt

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck's Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep22
programme.desc: Mumbai Dance Party - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard visit a fellow Wizard in Mumbai to take part in a big Bollywood dance number. programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Mysteries - The family is watching Detective Potato on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George use a magnifying glass to follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Bubbles - Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Bedtime - Its nearly time for bed and Peppa and George are called in for their bath. After that, they brush their teeth and get into bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but its been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Four-Leaf Clover - Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Collection - Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. The others have all one sticks, bubbles, sounds, tools. They help Anna to find her memories with her friends

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins / Paddington's Life Guard Training - The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Paddington's Football Dilemma - Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match, but he loves both places equally!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. Pancakeio - When Pancakeio the Pancake Wizard takes all the pancakes in Axle City, it's up to Blaze, Stripes, and Starla to become superheroes! Using their Super Wheels, they've got to get those pancakes back- just in time for breakfast!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Pups Save Francois the Penguin / Pups Save Daring Danny's Hippo - Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a carvasse. // Daring Danny wants a cool pet of his own, so he can't believe his luck when a stray baby hippo finds him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock / Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Pups Save a Goodway - When Adventure Bays famous statue ends up at the bottom of the Bay, Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to find a clever way to bring it back!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Friendaversary Adventure / Swiper's Birthday Surprise - Boots and Dora journey to Banana Hill to bring Isa a Friendiversary gift - a flowerpot that Boots painted himself! // Dora and friends throw Swiper a surprise birthday party. On the way to the party, Swiper attempts to swipe his own surprise present.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Splish Spashketball / The Slug Hank Redemption - Baby, Vola, and William head to Hydrospace to take on Shadow's team in the Splashketball Finals. // Detective Baby Shark and William Watson team up with Hank to help the Slobber Slug out of a jam.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shark Marks the Spot - Royce wants to go on a treasure hunt with Max, but Max is distracted with Sharkdog.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Fishers Go Fishing - On a fishing trip Sharkdog meets a Great White Shark and Max fears he'll lose his best friend to his wild instincts.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Sharkdoghouse - Max needs to create a permanent home for Sharkdog and he knows that his best friends, Olivia and Royce, are just the people to help him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Traffic Jam - Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zo Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When its home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Freeze Pops / Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes ice pops but can't wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking. // Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep412
programme.desc: Snow Day Showdown - It's a snowy day in Axle City, and every truck in town is lining up for a delicious winter warm-up: hot chocolate! But when Crusher tries to take all the hot chocolate for himself, Blaze is in hot pursuit to get it back!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Construction Crew to the Rescue - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped at the top of a tall, rickety tower, Blaze, Stripes and Starla transform into awesome construction vehicles to build a way down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pool Day / Circus Pup-Formers - Its a hot day and the pups head for the water park but the pool is empty! Paw Patrol to the rescue. // When the animals dont show up in time for the Circus to start; Ryder and the Paw Patrol step in to help.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Pups Save a Super Pup / Pups Save Ryder's Robot - Rubble is pretending to be a super pup but gets himself in some trouble. Ryder and the Paw Patrol have to save Rubble! // When Ryders Robot Pup breaks and starts going wild around Adventure Bay, it takes the whole Paw Patrol to help Ryder find it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Findependence Day / Costello Quits - Fishy Force takes on a villain who steals all the treats in Carnivore Cove. // When Costello quits, Vigo sets out to be a supervillain without his henchfishy.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Slug Hank Redemption - Detective Baby Shark and William Watson team up with Hank to help the Slobber Slug out of a jam.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Paddington's Football Dilemma / Paddington Has To Say Goodbye - Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match, but he loves both places equally! // The time has come for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still time for one last adventure, or is there?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Alebrije Adventure / Let's Get A Paleta - Ale the Alebrije asks Dora for her help! Dora goes to rescue her and get paletas for everyone.

programme.desc: Officer Blaze - Blaze and AJ are joining the police department! With the help of their new police pal, Officer Anna, Blaze transforms into a super-fast police car to lend a helping hand (or tire) to any truck in trouble.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep104

programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. programme.desc: Women-only trips and solo camping are some of the many ways that people enjoy camping in Japan. Camping can even serve as a method of preparing for disaster. We examine its increasing popularity.

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: Shiso: a Japanese herb gaining fans worldwide. Refreshing shiso is key in Japanese cuisine, which features a lot of raw fish. See how shiso's leaves, flowers and seeds are all used in oishii dishes.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Brightening Their Twilight Years
programme.desc: We revisit the highland village where their doctor not only provides care for its aging residents but is also reinvigorating the community, helping revitalize the area with his energy and fresh ideas.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Planet Taxi: A Ride Through Hanoi
programme.desc: A taxi through Vietnam's capital, Hanoi. See this vibrant city's true colors out the window of a taxi, and in conversations with the drivers we meet.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: Sasaki helps children handle the medical environment of a pediatric ward, creating a gentle atmosphere. Through the children's lives, we look at the importance of everyday life and how to restore it.

programme.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
programme.desc: Featured recipe: White Mizu-yokan with Matcha Syrup. Learn about Japanese home cooking with Master Chef Saito, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques in five minutes!

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Life On Remote Islands
programme.desc: Japan has over 14,000 islands and their inhabitants keep each unique local culture alive. Kobi Island has just 13 residents; we met four lively women who pray at the local shrine's sacred boulder.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: Kamikochi is a beautiful mountainous region in Nagano Prefecture that's 1,500m above sea level. With a mirror-like pond and rime ice, see the frozen beauty of Kamikochi through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Rockie And Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: Let'S Enjoy Math
programme.desc: Numbler erases a part of a cake delivery memo, resulting in the delivery of four cakes instead of one. Barky solves the mystery by showing the difference between ordinal numbers and cardinal numbers.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Time Scoop Hunter
programme.desc: Sawajima Yuichi travels to the Warring States Period, when three ninja receive a top-secret order to steal an enemy castle's architectural plans. Will they be able to accomplish their mission?

programme.title: Cinematic Journey
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Discover the unique, traditional method of roof thatching that uses Hinoki cypress bark.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions
programme.desc: The stories behind hit Japanese products, plus top creations for niche markets. This time: tactile paving & crab stick machines.

programme.title: Bosai: Tornadoes
programme.desc: Tornadoes are difficult to predict, striking without warning and causing tremendous damage. In this episode, we'll take a closer look at how new radar and the latest research may help save lives.

programme.title: Pythagoraswitch Mini
programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking, we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "The Algorithm March", etc.
